resources.string:
This Magic 8-ball answers you when 
 you turn the device upside down and 
 wait until it vibrates. After you can 
 turn the device in normal position.
 Enjoy!

string-array.name: responses
string-array.item: You guys, I\n have no idea
My boss would kill me\n if you did that
No, next time read\n the directions
I made a youtube video\n for this question
If you'll just hold your\n questions for a bit
Well is the bathroom\n pass on the hook?
